Title: The Neon Demon
Writer: Nicolas Winding Refn (story by), Nicolas Winding Refn (screenplay by), Mary Laws (screenplay by), Polly Stenham (screenplay by)
Actors: Elle Fanning, Karl Glusman, Jena Malone, Bella Heathcote
Plot: An aspiring model, Jesse, is new to Los Angeles. However, her beauty and youth, which generate intense fascination and jealousy within the fashion industry, may prove themselves sinister.
Production: Gaumont, Space Rocket Nation, Wild Bunch
